document.full_text: the speaker of the house of commons found the conservative government in contempt of parliament for refusing to provide cost estimates for a new anticrime program and because of potentially misleading remarks from a cabinet minister.
document.title: the americas: canada: conservatives in contempt
lines_and_colors: the speaker of the house of commons found the conservative government in contempt of parliament for refusing to provide cost estimates for a new anticrime program and because of potentially misleading remarks from a cabinet minister.
